title: Commemorating the 14th Anniversary of Homecrest Community Services, and honoring its dedication and strong record of service
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  commemorating the 14th Anniversary of Homecrest
Community Services, and honoring its dedication  and  strong  record  of
service to the Brooklyn community and the City of New York

WHEREAS,  It  is  the  sense of this Legislative Body that organizations
which work to improve the quality of life of the communities they  serve
merit the highest commendation of the State Senate and the people of the
State of New York; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and fully in accord with its long-
standing  traditions,  this  Legislative Body is justly proud to commem-
orate the 14th Anniversary of Homecrest Community Services, and to honor
its dedication and strong record of service to  the  Brooklyn  community
and  the  City of New York, to be recognized at a celebration on Friday,
March 4, 2011; and
  WHEREAS, Homecrest Community Services (HCS) has two centers in  Brook-
lyn,  at Sheepshead Bay and Bensonhurst, and is a community based multi-
service agency that provides social services to senior citizens who  are
immigrants, mainly from China, Korea and Vietnam; and
  WHEREAS,  This valuable organization provides services including immi-
gration, education, citizenship, health information, senior service, and
SADC programs to senior citizens, new immigrants, and children and fami-
lies in need; and
  WHEREAS, Throughout its  14  years  of  service,  Homecrest  Community
Services  has  provided  services  to over 140,000 Chinese Americans and
currently, represents over 3,000 Chinese Americans in New York City; and
  WHEREAS, Moreover, Homecrest Community Services  has  provided  nutri-
tious  and delicious hot lunches to its residents; enriched their social
and cultural lives; promoted their health and well-being;  and  improved
their  standard  for the English language, as well as educated them with
useful messages and legal consultation; and
  WHEREAS, This significant milestone is  an  excellent  opportunity  to
recognize  the special contributions of Homecrest Community Services and
the dedicated individuals who strive to better the quality of  life  for
senior citizens in the community; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body that those organiza-
tions  which  enhance the well-being and vitality of their community and
have shown a long and sustained commitment to excellence certainly  have
earned  the  recognition  and applause of all the citizens of this great
Empire State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
commemorate the 14th Anniversary of Homecrest Community Services, and to
honor its dedication and strong record of service to the Brooklyn commu-
nity and the City of New York; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Homecrest Community Services.
